description: This Kotlin source file defines the navigation graph for an Android TV application built with Jetpack Compose. It sets up navigation routes, a persistent sidebar menu with navigation buttons, and the main content area that switches between different screens such as Home, Live TV Guide, Search, Settings, Video Details, and Player screens.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object containing string constants for navigation route paths.

methods.name: TVNavGraph
methods.description: Main composable function that initializes the navigation controller and sets up the scaffold layout with persistent navigation.

methods.name: TVScaffold
methods.description: Private composable that constructs the UI with a sidebar navigation menu and the main content area managed by NavHost.

methods.name: NavButton
methods.description: A button styled for TV with focus support to navigate between different sections of the app.
